numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that baseball is a sport.
2. Baseball has the least number of players of color.
3. This situation makes me wonder about a reason.
4. I wonder why baseball is this way.
5. I wonder if there is a specific reason for this situation.
6. This situation has an impact on my community.
7. I wonder what my community can do.
8. My community can include children of all races.
9. Children of all races can participate in certain sports.
10. If children of all races participate in certain sports, then the gap at the professional level will not exist.
